code: import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SettingsPanel=_ref=>{let{settings,setSettings,isGenerating}=_ref;const handleSettingChange=(key,value)=>{setSettings(prev=>({...prev,[key]:value}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["\u751F\u6210\u957F\u5EA6: ",settings.gen_length]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"16",max:"128",step:"8",value:settings.gen_length,onChange:e=>handleSettingChange('gen_length',parseInt(e.target.value)),disabled:isGenerating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["\u53BB\u566A\u6B65\u6570: ",settings.steps]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"8",max:"64",step:"4",value:settings.steps,onChange:e=>handleSettingChange('steps',parseInt(e.target.value)),disabled:isGenerating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["\u6E29\u5EA6: ",settings.temperature.toFixed(1)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0.0",max:"1.0",step:"0.1",value:settings.temperature,onChange:e=>handleSettingChange('temperature',parseFloat(e.target.value)),disabled:isGenerating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["CFG\u6BD4\u4F8B: ",settings.cfg_scale.toFixed(1)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0.0",max:"2.0",step:"0.1",value:settings.cfg_scale,onChange:e=>handleSettingChange('cfg_scale',parseFloat(e.target.value)),disabled:isGenerating})]})]});};export default SettingsPanel;
